name: Helping Hand

services.title: Free Tier
services.description: Therapy for free. Interact with the model for a limited amount of times each day with the choice to watch ads to experience nearly a full therapy session per day.

services.title: Entry Tier ($9.99)
services.description: Experience our AI model with full interactivity (including the visualizer) with a restriction on the number of requests to one full therapy session per day. Lacks the ability to train the model to your needs.

services.title: Premium Tier ($19.99)
services.description: Experience all the perks of our entry-level tier, with full interactivity, access to the visualizer, along with training of the model, and infinite requests. Also, enjoy free referrals to nearby therapists in your area.

aboutpara:
WELCOME TO THE NEW AGE
In this era of unparalleled technological advancement, we proudly introduce Helping Hand, your AI-powered therapist. This innovative application is at the forefront of revolutionizing mental health care, making therapy more affordable, accessible, and available than ever before. Embrace the future where technology bridges the gap to mental well-being.
